mapper.sql: flow_id, flow_code, account_id, fee_property, money, original_money, create_date, is_deleted
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_fee_flow (flow_code, account_id, fee_property, money, original_money, create_date, is_deleted) values (#{flowCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{feeProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=REAL}, #{originalMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update t_fee_flow set flow_code = #{flowCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fee_property = #{feeProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=REAL}, original_money = #{originalMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where flow_id = #{flowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from t_fee_flow where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by flow_id desc
